title: Democrat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose another player to make Homeless at night. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A Homeless player will permanently lose a vote, being unable to vote if they have 0 votes.
- Town is informed of a player becoming Homeless.
- If you strike a Monarch (3839) with poverty, instead of becoming Homeless they will instead lose all charges, being informed they were hit by a Democrat. You may not strike this player again.
- You will have Basic Defense while a Homeless player is alive.
- You cannot strike a player with Poverty twice.
